Is there any update for `related_blog_posts` ?
I would like to change the order to the most recent, but could not find a description of that.

I found the following post on the Slack channel.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1637364155246700>
He told to use blog_recent_tag_posts here, but I am hesitant because it seems a bit labor intensive to use it. If there is a way to change the order using `related_blog_posts`, please let me know.
